entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider incorporating SimdBase64 #107816
    10.0.0
  • Aot build bug #107807
  • USB Flash Drive DriveType reported as Fixed by DriveInfo - Linux #107803
  • JIT bit test is not recognized for pattern matching syntax #107801
    10.0.0
  • Possible deadlock on process exit if GC is in progress #107800
    10.0.0
  • System.Text.Json should support deserializing more collection types #107787
    10.0.0
  • terminate called after throwing an instance of 'PAL_SEHException' #107785
  • Unable to deserialize ArraySegment<int> with System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Deserialize #107783
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8PropertyName API #107782
    10.0.0

Closed

  • `ref readonly` parameters of a generic type may get corrupted #107710
  • Use transitive reference packages instead of explicit reference packages. #107439
  • Possible regression with [ThreadStatic] in debug builds on .NET 9 RC1 #107728
  • After creating a Worker service project, "System.text.json" 8.0.0 was referenced and identified as a vulnerable package #105120
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed '(targetReg == op1Reg) || (targetReg != op3Reg)' during 'Generate code' #106866
    9.0.0
  • can not attach to debugger, signature validation issues. #107684
    10.0.0
  • Unactionable trim warnings when using DataSet and IXmlSerializable #107704
    10.0.0
  • How to definition event with ComWrappers? #107779
  • SSLStream write delay on Android #106885
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Stress/ABI/tailcalls_do/tailcalls_do.cmd #107727
    9.0.0
  • `Enumerable.CountBy` enumerates an `IEnumerable` instead of returning it directly #107794
  • [mono] Fix swift struct lowering support for `InlineArray` #107736
    10.0.0
  • Unify/Simplify PFX Private Key lifetime on Windows #48789
    Future
  • Version 8.0.401 release broke ability to run app with WebDriverAgent from Appium on iOS #107781
  • ServiceBase should not accept SERVICE_CONTROL_STOP during SERVICE_START_PENDING #23173
  • Investigate potential Timer latency issues on macOS #11226
  • [API Proposal]: Custom [Try]GetValue<T> methods on JsonElement for efficient projection of string values to dotnet types #74028
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: LINQ terminator .WhenAll() wrapping Task.WhenAll #107706
  • [9.0] System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.ConcurrentBidirectionalReadsWrites_Success is hanging #107762
    9.0.0
  • Considerable performance gap between `Enumerable.ToList<T>()` and `List(IEnumerable<T>)` constructor #107560
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize throws not expected ArgumentOutOfRangeException #107729
  • Add AsyncWaitersCount property to SemaphoreSlim #5234
  • SemaphoreSlim fairness issue #5600
  • Apps can reach the sync table limit before a GC occurs #7768
  • Proposal: Static call to the OS GetCurrentThreadId #8636
  • Miscellaneous ReaderWriterLockSlim issues #8710
  • Suggestion: NUMA aware ThreadPool #9748
  • `Task.Delay` is less accuracy than `time.Sleep` in Golang #11609
  • Performance regression: EmptyAsyncMethodInvocation benchmark #13132
  • Using a default method on an interface to implement a static virtual interface method leads to memory corruption #107754

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve TeddyHelper.RightShift helpers for AVX512 #107819
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0]: ARM64-SVE: Allow SVE ops to re-use the same registers #107818
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix perf problems found in investigation of issue #107728 #107817
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Additional Tar tests for filled in size when data is empty #107815
    test-enhancement, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [release/9.0] Doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107814
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • Fix the operands of NI_AVX512F_TernaryLogic during lowering #107813
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: use explicit cast away GC when passing byref to unmanaged callees #107811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107810
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Move computation of `DebuggerAssemblyControlFlags` from `DomainAssembly` to `Assembly` #107809
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove `AppDomain` from `DebugInterface::Load/UnloadClass` #107808
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Switch a couple properties to new VMR properties #107805
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107804
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] ARM64-SVE: Fix hwintrinsics flags #107802
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Further improve ProbabilisticMap on Avx512 #107798
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [NRBF] Remove array allocation when decoding `decimal`s. #107797
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • fix OS detection for test scripts #107796
    area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] HTTP trailers #107795
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Backport NRBF fixes and Fuzzer #107788
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • ARM64: Fix lsra for AdvSimd_LoadAndInsertScalar #107786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added JsonMarshal.GetRawUtf8PropertyName API and corresponding JsonProperty tests. #107784
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Export `monovm_create_delegate` #107778
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: adjust where folded comma throws are morphed #107777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add comments to host error_codes.h #107775
    area-Host

Merged

  • Fix perf problems found in investigation of issue #107728 #107806
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107773
    documentation, area-Meta
  • JIT: random partial compilation stress mode #107561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Revert "[GC] Avoid OOM in large-allocation-only workloads (#105521)" #107712
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update WebAssembly nuget package references to RC1 SDK #107673
    area-Infrastructure
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow SVE ops to re-use the same registers #107084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Store `Assembly` instead of `DomainAssembly` in `AssemblySpecBindingCache` and `BINDER_SPACE::Assembly` #107799
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add feature switch to disable DataSet XML serialization #107713
    area-System.Data
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix hwintrinsics flags #107791
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/9.0] Arm64/Sve: Remove entries of SVE APIs take 32-bit address #107780
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Propagate block flags properly in indirectCallTransformer #107790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix memory corruption bug in virtual static method dispatch #107776
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0][browser] Enable the log profiler #107747
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove `DebuggerModule::m_pAppDomain` - always the one and only #107774
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Make `AppDomain::AssemblyIterator` iterate over `Assembly` instead of `DomainAssembly` #107768
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Fixed swift lowering support for inline arrays #107744
    area-VM-meta-mono, area-Interop-mono
  • Add Perf Improvements in .NET 9 to deep dive blog posts list #107793
    area-Meta
  • Arm64/Sve: Remove entries of SVE APIs take 32-bit address #107758
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0] Move UseSystemZlib into SetupOSSpecificProps #107770
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression, 9.0.0
  • Remove `DebuggerModule::Get/SetPrimaryModule` - always itself #107767
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix memory corruption bug in virtual static method dispatch #107763
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm: Free up upper-half register that was not ready because of its association with busy lower-half register #107714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Profiler] Update GetFunctionInfo2 to have a decent default ClassID #107753
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fixing System.Array constructor #107266
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • WebSocket Feedback Follow-up #107662
    area-System.Net
  • [PERF] Move performance testing logic into python scripts #101143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Restructure JSImport/JSExport generators to share more code and utilize more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration shared code #107769
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Remove redundant !fgIsCommaThrow(morphedTree) assert #107760
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107091
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix `emitter::emitSplit` to not create zero-sized method fragment #107568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Process LinkerArg for wasm targets #107194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • [RISC-V] Fix Int32 to Unsigned overflow check #107024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix some minor errors #107179
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NRBF] Address issues discovered by Threat Model #106629
    new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.119, windows: 128.0.6613.120 #107504
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107708
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Update ABI doc #107286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NRBF] Comments and bug fixes from security review #107735
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • GC test cleanup #107000
    test-enhancement, area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix comments in AggregateException.GetBaseException() #107743
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Improve the performance of `CollectionExtensions.InsertRange` by reducing 1 array copy #107683
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Ilc failure in PHASE_EARLY_PROP #2683

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initial version of the managed stack traces on Browser #2677

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet test hangs with .NET9 RC1 in CI build on Ubuntu #43432
  • [WebToolsE2E] After installing .NET SDK 9.0 RC2, an error "MSB4018: The "DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints" task failed unexpectedly." in the Error List when create ASP.NET Core Web App (Razor Pages) or MVC 6.0/8.0 IndAuth project. #43407
  • 9.0.100-rc.1: dotnet restore crashes in Docker on linux/arm64 #43405
  • 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.12 linux-arm64 and Segmentation fault #43404
  • The NuGet template should add package source mapping and package source auditing. #43398

Closed

  • NETSDK1060 Error reading assets file: Error loading lock file... Could not load file or assembly 'System.Text.Json, Version=8.0.0.4,... #43433
  • After installing SDK 9.0 RC2, creating ASP.NET Core Web App (Razor Pages) (Individual) project, some packages are not loaded successfully. #43341
  • `RuntimeIdentifier` is not correctly populated when not supplied #43356

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43445
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43441
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43440
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable stage-2 builds #43439
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable FS0064 when building fsharp #43436
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't forward along binlog arguments to runnable applications #43430
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Remove unused property from Microsoft.NET.CrossGen.targets #43429
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • dotnet-format batch replace EndOfLine instead of one by one #43399
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Use NuGetAudit property to condition NuGet source auditing #43397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Typo in Comment #43428
    untriaged
  • Remove legacy source build property usage #43435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [9.0.1xx] Proto/enable buildcheck telemetry rc2 #43431
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Add support for join point vertical job in vmr-build.yml #43288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Shutdown toolset compilers #43135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add RazorLangVersion 9 #40348
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #43400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #43401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.1 September 2024 Updates #43363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.1 September 2024 Updates #43396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools #43045
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies (#40725) #43393
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish prebuilt reports for each repo #43336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: also try Basic auth when username is '<token>'. #43354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider logging more info to Hot Reload output pane #75115
  • EnC: Revisit automatic inclusion of EnC logs in VS Feedback #75114
  • Fixed buffer size expression has no symbol info #75113
  • EnC docs: Move "supported edits" info from Roslyn repo to learn.microsoft.docs #75112
  • EnC: Add UI that displays active changes as a diff #75111
  • EnC: Visualize changed statements that have not been executed yet #75110
  • Syntax highlighting missing from just the active C# file in a Visual Basic project on second vertical document group when solution opened #75109
  • Type name of EditorFeaturesOnTheFlyDocsElement appears at the end of QuickInfo in Razor component #75106

Closed

  • [LSP] [Bug]: Tab-completion of type name does not add required namespace #69442
    18.0
  • [LSP] [Feature Request]: Improve adding new lines to documentation comments #68479
    Backlog
  • [LSP] [Bug]: No suggestions displayed when attempting to add a new documentation comment tag #68480
    18.0
  • Debug Assert error in MethodToStateMachineRewriter #74362
    17.12
  • Enable `RefFieldTypeAllowsRefLike` test once we get support for 'byreflike' in IL #73553
    17.12
  • Assert failure when building runtime: argument captured byref #75035
    17.12
  • Ref assignment to ref ternary silently falls back to non-ref assignment #75023
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35312.85 #75101

PullRequests

Created

  • Field-backed properties: definite assignment #75116
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add `Enumerable.Reverse(this T[])` polyfill #75104
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Fix null coalescing operator emit with span conversion #75103
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Allow Razor to get diagnostics for cohosting #75102
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Keep try syntax in async exception rewriting #75070
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged, Next
  • Use the latest version of ILasm and enable a test not supported by the old version #75108
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Fix typo in RequestTelemetryLogger.UpdateTelemetryData #75050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move some emit tests from Emit2 to Emit3 to avoid hitting UserString heap limit #75091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Adjust an assert in EmitArgument #75067
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Switch to new VMR control set #75056
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow ref assignment to ternary or another ref assignment #75076
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Better Collection Expression Conversion From Expression #74993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, New Feature - ParamsCollections, 17.12
  • Upgrade xUnit #75068
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support for per-file content exclusion in Rename Suggestions #74903
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Test and document Span breaking changes #75079
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Merge latest bits from 'main' branch into extensions branch #75090
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Exclude identifiers in misplaced attributes from identifier map #75100
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Issue 74872 #75094
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Adjust IsMetadataVirtual assertion in MethodToClassRewriter #75066
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove some obsolete build properties #75096
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #74982
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Suppress an assert when an indexer is declared, but DefaultMemberNameAttribute is missing. #75099
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge `main` into `features/FirstClassSpan` #75077
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Verify that semantic snippets obey IDE preferences #75073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HostBuilder Build PhysicalFileProvider on hostingEnvironment.ContentRootPath #57867
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json_middleware #57865
  • Issue with Swashbuckle when starting the api (v17.11) #57861
  • Governing the date with EditForm #57860
  • DbUpdateConcurrencyException when using AutoSaveChanges #57856
  • OpenApi ApiVersionAttribute.Deprecated not reflected in schema #57853
  • How to run an async method when a property in a child control is changed? #57851
  • Is there a way to evict a cache entry by value in addition to evicting by tag - OutputCaching Asp.Net Core #57850

Closed

  • Modify `ChangeDetection.IsKnownImmutableType` to support custom immutable types w/o perf impact #57776
  • Improve thread shutdown management in ANCM #45066
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Kestrel HTTP/2 Timeout Behavior in Debugging Sessions is Problematic #52031
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Add Meters for SignalR #2461
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf regression: mvc #57829
  • Flaky RunIndividualTestCase(http2_6.9.1_2) test #30373
    Test failures
  • Blazor different base path produces error #57843
  • Perf regression: single_query, single_query #57814
  • Quarantine StreamPool_StreamIsInvalidState_DontReturnedToPool #40626
    Test failures
  • PublishTrimmed causes a runtime error related to source generation #55783
  • OpaqueRedirection doesn't respect HTTP/HTTPS scheme behind a load balancer. #57650

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] [Templates] Updates libraries dependencies content #57864
    Servicing-approved, * NO MERGE *, area-ui-rendering
  • [Templates] Updates libraries dependencies content #57863
    area-ui-rendering
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/MessagePack-CSharp from `ecc4e18` to `9511905` #57857
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix mapping for nested schemas and [Produces] attributes in OpenAPI implementation #57852
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Invoke inbound activity handlers on circuit initialization #57715
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.9
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57859
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.StackExchangeRedis` package README #57825
    area-dataprotection, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] [Identity][Templates] Ensure placeholders don't overlap with text #57789
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 9.0-rc2
  • Unskip RunIndividualTestCase(http2_6.9.1_2) #57849
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine StreamPool_StreamIsInvalidState_DontReturnedToPool #57847
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Templates] Fix template scripts, make them more flexible and robust #57841
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-13
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix arithmetic overflow when memory dump has too many objects. #4928

Updated

  • Add IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_ARM64X and IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_ARM64EC #2858

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 9 Preview not working on android #24761
  • [regression/8.0.80] [Android] ObjectDisposedException with AndroidX.AppCompat.Widget.AppCompatImageView #24757
  • MAUI BlazorWebView fails to establish WebRTC connection on Android due to insecure host (https://0.0.0.0) #24755
  • Migrate to OnBackPressedCallback #24752
    Backlog
  • Android native dialog accessibility #24749
    Backlog
  • Add IsVisible to MenuItem in Shell #24748

Closed

  • Icons in Shell TabBar and AppBar are no longer updated after changing the UserAppTheme #20243
    Backlog
  • ToolbarItem font icon color not updating with AppThemeBinding #23201
    Backlog
  • ToolbarItem icon doesn't work with MVVM Binding on iOS #20508
    Backlog
  • The DataTrigger in the CollectionView inside the Popup doesn't work correctly when scrolling #24655
    Backlog
  • DataTrigger styles do not override element styles #24750
    Backlog
  • Extend the button class with a 'content' button #24747
  • Permissions.CheckStatusAsync not working first time #23035
  • [iOS/Android] Setting Background to null will not update rendering (for example Label.Background = null after it was set to Yellow stays Yellow) #24725
  • My Splash screen is not working in ios after upgrade to net8.0 #23736
  • VisualElement.ToPlatform(mauiContext) fails when using `UseMauiCompatibility()` #21644
  • DEP1000 Error on Maui Project #24544

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Uitests on Azure Pipelines #24765
  • Adds a rendering performance test #24762
    community ✨
  • Add Padding for iOS Buttons in some scenarios #24760
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • [net9.0] Update merge main net9 #24759
  • Compressed layout is back (maybe?) #24758
    community ✨
  • [xaml] fix potential NRE in `{Binding}` #24756
  • Fixed Flickering Issue When Toggling WebView Visibility on Android #24753
    community ✨

Merged

  • [ci] Use our own pool #24754
  • [C] Add ImageSource as LogicalChildren of MenuItem #24688
    area-xaml
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #24206
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [Localization] Remove check not allowing translations to run on net9.0 #24724
    area-localization
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Improve keyboard scrolling with editors, contentInsets, and different keyboards #24589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview, area-keyboard
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24691
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0][Enhancement][iOS] Add a done button to entry #24645
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] Custom font icon is not rendered in a shell tabbar tab #24721
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] IndicatorView with DataTemplate (custom image) does not render correctly when ItemsSource change #24717
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • Setting Background to null will update rendering on Android and iOS #24726
    area-theme
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨, area-controls-frame, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reenable F# tests #34675
    MQ
  • Migration ignores Fluent API configuration via IEntityTypeConfiguration #34674
  • InvalidOperationException with multiple HasDbFunction in 9 RC1 #34672
  • Connection Timeout #34671

Closed

  • Reusing Include Statements #34661
  • String.Join does not use STRING_AGG serverside when using a navigation property #34673
  • How to correctly reference other table using EF Core and CHAR(2) foreign key? #34543

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Enable Central Package Management #34666
  • [release/9.0] Update SDK to 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.12 #34669
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34621
  • [release/9.0] Handle leaf entity projection in Cosmos #34662
    tell-mode
